contest-event.event-date:
July 3, 1901 D Thomas Denham Memorial Contest
Thomas Denham Memorial Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
thomas-denham-memorial-contest
None
Greenhead Park, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Second of three contests in aid of the movement to erect in the park a memorial to Alderman Thomas Denham. Prizes of 40 and 35 guineas to the two winning bands. Two bands play in each contest.
40 guinea prize went to Wyke & Linthwaite Bands, 35 guinea prize to Batley and Denton.
March 25, 2014, 4:54 p.m. March 30, 2017, 12:24 p.m.
1 Linthwaite Silver Band Unknown
1 Wyke Unknown
